detectors.description:
Artem._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#262-273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#265)
detectors.markdown:
[Artem._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#L262-L273) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#L265)

detectors.description:
Artem.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#161-170) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= expiry,Artem::delegateBySig: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#168)
detectors.markdown:
[Artem.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#L161-L170) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

detectors.description: Constant Artem.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#15) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

delegate(address) should be declared external:
	- Artem.delegate(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#148-150)

getPriorVotes(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Artem.getPriorVotes(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Artem.sol#189-221)
